Title: La caduta degli angeli ribelli
Writer: Marco Tullio Giordana (screenplay), Vincenzo Caretti (screenplay), Mario Gallo (screenplay)
Actors: Clio Goldsmith, Vittorio Mezzogiorno, Yves Beneyton, Francesca Archibugi
Plot: Who is the mysterious stranger Cecilia met on the street? Why is he suspicious of everyone? She is happily married, has a lovely child and an interesting job: she has no motive to be ...
